title: Komplexní mluvní terapie
description: Specialized care for children from infancy through adolescence, addressing articulation, language development, and communication disorders.

title: Grafologie
description: Comprehensive support for adults recovering from stroke, brain injury, or other conditions affecting speech and language abilities.
